name: AVCaptureDevice.Format
desc: A set of media format and capture settings (such as video resolution and frame rate) that you use to configure a capture device.

items.name: var mediaType: AVMediaType
items.desc: A constant describing the media type of an AVCaptureDevice active or supported format.

items.name: var formatDescription: CMFormatDescription
items.desc: An object describing the capture format.

items.name: var isVideoHDRSupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the format supports high dynamic range streaming.

items.name: var unsupportedCaptureOutputClasses: [AnyClass]
items.desc: The list of capture output subclasses not allowed for capture with this format, if any.

items.name: var highResolutionStillImageDimensions: CMVideoDimensions
items.desc: The highest resolution still image the system can produce for this format.

items.name: var isVideoBinned: Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether video data is produced in a binned format.

items.name: var isMultiCamSupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether AVCaptureMultiCamSession supports this format.

items.name: var isHighestPhotoQualitySupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this format supports the highest photo quality that the platform can deliver.

items.name: class AVFrameRateRange
items.desc: An AVFrameRateRange object expresses a range of valid frame rates as minimum and maximum rate and minimum and maximum duration.

items.name: var videoSupportedFrameRateRanges: [AVFrameRateRange]
items.desc: Indicates the format’s supported frame rate ranges.

items.name: enum AVCaptureVideoStabilizationMode
items.desc: Constants that describe the video stabilization modes that the device and format support.

items.name: var geometricDistortionCorrectedVideoFieldOfView: Float
items.desc: The format’s horizontal field of view after correction for geometric distortion.

items.name: var isGlobalToneMappingSupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the format supports global tone mapping.

items.name: func isVideoStabilizationModeSupported(AVCaptureVideoStabilizationMode) -> Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the format supports a given video stabilization mode.

items.name: var isHighPhotoQualitySupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this format supports high-quality capture with the current quality prioritization setting.

items.name: var isCenterStageSupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the format supports Center Stage.

items.name: var videoFrameRateRangeForCenterStage: AVFrameRateRange?
items.desc: The range of frame rates available when Center Stage is active.

items.name: var videoMinZoomFactorForCenterStage: CGFloat
items.desc: The minimum zoom factor available when Center Stage is active.

items.name: var videoMaxZoomFactorForCenterStage: CGFloat
items.desc: The maximum zoom factor available when Center Stage is active.

items.name: var supportedColorSpaces: [AVCaptureColorSpace]
items.desc: The list of the device’s supported color spaces.

items.name: var minExposureDuration: CMTime
items.desc: A CMTime indicating the minimum supported exposure duration.

items.name: var maxExposureDuration: CMTime
items.desc: A CMTime indicating the maximum supported exposure duration.

items.name: var minISO: Float
items.desc: A floating point number indicating the minimum supported exposure ISO value.

items.name: var maxISO: Float
items.desc: A floating point number indicating the maximum supported exposure ISO value.

items.name: enum AVCaptureDevice.Format.AutoFocusSystem
items.desc: Constants that describe the autofocus system.

items.name: var autoFocusSystem: AVCaptureDevice.Format.AutoFocusSystem
items.desc: Returns the autofocus system.

items.name: var videoFieldOfView: Float
items.desc: Indicates the format’s horizontal field of view in degrees.

items.name: var videoMaxZoomFactor: CGFloat
items.desc: Indicates the maximum zoom factor allowed for the format.

items.name: var videoZoomFactorUpscaleThreshold: CGFloat
items.desc: Indicates the zoom factor at which pixel data is upscaled.

items.name: var isPortraitEffectSupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the format supports the Portrait Effect feature.

items.name: var videoFrameRateRangeForPortraitEffect: AVFrameRateRange?
items.desc: The range of frame rates available when Portrait Effect is active.

items.name: var supportedDepthDataFormats: [AVCaptureDevice.Format]
items.desc: The list of data formats compatible with this video format.

items.name: var isPortraitEffectsMatteStillImageDeliverySupported: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the device supports portrait matte effects in still-image capture.

items.name: var videoMinZoomFactorForDepthDataDelivery: CGFloat
items.desc: The minimum zoom factor supported when the device is configured for depth data delivery.

items.name: var videoMaxZoomFactorForDepthDataDelivery: CGFloat
items.desc: The maximum zoom factor supported when the device is configured for depth data delivery.

items.name: enum AVCaptureDevice.LensStabilizationStatus
items.desc: Constants that indicate the status of optical image stabilization hardware during a bracketed photo capture.
